body_html: Hi everyone, I know this issue is closed but I hope somebody would answer! I have downloaded cuda 9.0 from the same link as @daisylab suggested (it's actually cuda 9.0.176), now that I have installed it, it shows cuda 9.1 instead of 9.0! and obviously tensorflow doesn't work complaining it can't find 9.0 libs. Can someone help me out please?
